de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.imv

Class ImvAdapterIetf

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.AbstractImAdapter
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.adapter.imv.ImvAdapterIetf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImvAdapterIetfLong, ImvAdapterTncsFirstIetf

    public class ImvAdapterIetf
extends AbstractImAdapter
implements org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMV
    IMV adapter according to IETF/TCG specifications. Implementing a simple IF-IMV IMV interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImvAdapterIetf

        public ImvAdapterIetf()
        Creates an IMV adapter with default arguments. This constructor is specified to be called to load an IMV from a source. A specific IMV must override this constructor and add its custom arguments. This implementation of the constructor should only be used for testing purpose.

      • ImvAdapterIetf

        public ImvAdapterIetf(ImParameter parameter,
              TncsAdapterFactory tncsFactory,
              ImSessionFactory<ImvSession> sessionFactory,
              ImSessionManager<org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection,ImvSession> sessionManager,
              ImEvaluatorFactory evaluatorFactory,
              ImvConnectionAdapterFactory connectionFactory,
              ImReader<? extends ImMessageContainer> imReader)
        Creates an IMV adapter with the specified arguments. This constructor is especially for inheritance.
        Parameters:
        parameter - the generic IMV parameter
        tncsFactory - the TNCS adapter factory
        sessionFactory - the factory for a connection session
        sessionManager - the session manager
        evaluatorFactory - the factory to instantiate the evaluation system
        connectionFactory - the connection adapter factory
        imReader - the integrity message reader

      • findSessionByConnection

        protected ImvSession findSessionByConnection(org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimv.IMVConnection connection)
        Finds a session to the given connection, if one exists. If not it creates a new session. Especially important for inheritance.
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection
        Returns:
        the session for the connection
